Author: Xenorosth
Message: Morning.

Author: Moderator
Message: Welcome Xenorosth.

Author: Xenorosth
Message: Evening.

Author: Moderator
Message: Thank you for participating in this study.

Author: Moderator
Message: In the next posts, I'll be going over the rules of the "game" you're about to play.

Author: Xenorosth
Message: Okay.

Author: Moderator
Message: Once I'll be done, I'll ask you if you've understood the rules, and if you haven't I'll explain them in different words.

Author: Moderator
Message: You're about to talk to Andrew. Andrew is a fictive character that has been completely created for the purpose of this study.

Author: Moderator
Message: You'll be talking to him twice.

Author: Moderator
Message: The only difference between the two conversations you'll have with him, is that in one of them Andrew will be played by a real human.

Author: Moderator
Message: In the other, it will be played by an Artificial Intelligence we are developing.

Author: Moderator
Message: We will call the Human and the Artificial Intelligence the Actors.

Author: Xenorosth
Message: Understood.

Author: Moderator
Message: The order in which you'll be talking to each Actor is random.

Author: Moderator
Message: You will not be talking twice with the same Actor.

Author: Moderator
Message: Both the Artificial Intelligence and the Human will try to portray the same Andrew in the most convincing way they can.

Author: Moderator
Message: Your goal is simple. After talking to the two actors, you'll have to guess which one was the Artificial Intelligence and which one was the Human.

Author: Moderator
Message: Whenever you have made your decision, you are able to stop the conversation.

Author: Xenorosth
Message: Can I use any methods I want?

Author: Moderator
Message: Yes you can.

Author: Moderator
Message: Each conversation will last for 15 minutes maximum if you do not decide to stop it before.

Author: Xenorosth
Message: Gotcha.

Author: Moderator
Message: Please, keep your posts to text only (No smileys, no links... etc)

Author: Moderator
Message: Do not type more than one post per answer.

Author: Moderator
Message: Do you understand the rules and what you have to do?

Author: Xenorosth
Message: Can I try to trick the AI?

Author: Moderator
Message: You can try as long as you respect the rules above.

Author: Xenorosth
Message: Okay. Will do.

Author: Moderator
Message: Good. Andrew will start the conversation. The 15 minutes will start after your answer. Are you ready?

Author: Xenorosth
Message: Ready

Author: Andrew
Message: Hello!

Author: Xenorosth
Message: Evening. How are you?

Author: Andrew
Message: I'm doing quite alright! What about you?

Author: Xenorosth
Message: Well enough. Just curious, are you good at math?

Author: Andrew
Message: Ugh to some extent I guess. Why?

Author: Xenorosth
Message: I'm doing calculus.

Author: Andrew
Message: Oh that's cool! I study Biology.

Author: Xenorosth
Message: What type?

Author: Andrew
Message: Human Biology, and hopefully Neurobiology next year.

Author: Xenorosth
Message: What's the difference?

Author: Andrew
Message: Well, Human Biology is about the whole body. Neurobiology only focuses on the neural system.

Author: Xenorosth
Message: Cotton candy?

Author: Andrew
Message: Ugh?

Author: Xenorosth
Message: Never mind. Tell me what do you know about human biology? Have you gone into mitochondria?

Author: Andrew
Message: Well, of course I have, doesn't everyone learn at least a bit about the mitochondria though? Don't need to be in Biology to know that. Do you have a more specific question though?

Author: Xenorosth
Message: Nah. What do you know about neurons?

Author: Andrew
Message: Well, they are structured around 3 main parts. The dentritic tree, the axon and the stoma. They are also one of the very few cells that you can keep for your entire life.

Author: Xenorosth
Message: I think I'm done. I need no more information with this Andrew.

Author: Moderator
Message: Conversation Interrupted!

Author: Moderator
Message: Which actor do you think you've been talking to (This is not your final answer)

Author: Xenorosth
Message: The AI.

Author: Moderator
Message: Alright. We'll start the next conversation. Andrew will begin and then you'll have 15 minutes after your answer. Are you ready?

Author: Xenorosth
Message: Yes.

Author: Andrew
Message: Hello!

Author: Xenorosth
Message: Evening. How are you?

Author: Andrew
Message: I'm doing quite alright! What about you?

Author: Xenorosth
Message: Well enough. What are you working on recently?

Author: Andrew
Message: Mostly studying for the coming exams.

Author: Xenorosth
Message: What exams do you have?

Author: Andrew
Message: Cellular Biology, Anatomy, Chemistry and Physiology.

Author: Xenorosth
Message: How good are you at math?

Author: Andrew
Message: I'm alright I guess? Depends.

Author: Xenorosth
Message: How about Calculus?

Author: Andrew
Message: Well, it depends really.

Author: Xenorosth
Message: Do you like math?

Author: Andrew
Message: I do yes. From far away.

Author: Xenorosth
Message: From far away?

Author: Andrew
Message: Yup.

Author: Xenorosth
Message: From far away?

Author: Andrew
Message: Well yeah?

Author: Xenorosth
Message: Why the question mark?

Author: Andrew
Message: Well I'm wondering what you mean.

Author: Xenorosth
Message: Explain.

Author: Andrew
Message: Explain what? Mind elaborating a little bit?

Author: Xenorosth
Message: Explain your last statement please.

Author: Andrew
Message: I don't really see what you don't understand in it. It seems pretty obvious to me.

Author: Xenorosth
Message: Stop the convo. This one is more likely to be the AI.

Author: Moderator
Message: Conversation interrupted!

Author: Moderator
Message: Which actor do you think you've been talking to in the first conversation?

Author: Xenorosth
Message: Human.

Author: Moderator
Message: On a scale from 1 (not sure at all) to 7 (certain), how confident are you of your answer?

Author: Moderator
Message: Alright thank you for your participation! If you've given your e-mail, we'll send you some information about the results of this study in the coming months.

Author: Xenorosth
Message: Who was who? Was I right?

Author: Moderator
Message: If you have any comments you'd like to share, feel free to do so now. Otherwise you can now close this window.

Author: Xenorosth
Message: Or am I not allowed to know?

Author: Moderator
Message: I can give you the answer after you give comments, if you decide to give any. Otherwise I can tell you now.

Author: Xenorosth
Message: Well, in conversation two, it's a common thing for robots to have a feature that makes an "excuse" for not being able to elaborate. The actor is VERY good at simulating certain actions an AI might do.

Author: Moderator
Message: Is this all?

Author: Xenorosth
Message: I think the last thing is that there is a slightly situation where it's very clear "Andrew" either coded the robot, or has access to what he'd say, considering the mimicked approach.

Author: Xenorosth
Message: That's all.

Author: Moderator
Message: Alright. You were correct. The actual human was the first conversation.

Author: Xenorosth
Message: Thanks. Enjoyed it. Closing the window!
